meta.name: description
meta.content: Photo and video gallery showcasing community events, campaigns, and public service activities.

div.p: Capturing moments of community engagement, public service, and progress.
Watch highlights from recent events and speeches
Complete coverage of the community town hall discussion on education reform initiatives and community feedback.
Speech at the launch of the new community healthcare program and its impact on local communities.
Highlights from the youth leadership program graduation ceremony and inspiring speeches from graduates.
Record attendance at education reform discussion
First class of youth leadership program
Authorized and paid for by Friends of Belayneh Bahiru
